analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x3b81d9f7afb4d4cab0fba191b3831219a0469b82.sol:
	Contract TokenBNH has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x3b81d9f7afb4d4cab0fba191b3831219a0469b82.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
